attributes.action: introduce the reccommendations of the Sir Christopher Kelly report as 1st January 2010 and thereby ensure that individuals standing as Members of Parliament in the forthcoming General Election are doing so having embraced the report, its findings and acknowledge that this is the only way to start to demonstrate to the public that they finally 'get it' and are thereby elected on that basis.

rejection.details: Implementation of the Kelly report is a matter for the IPSA, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
